Articles.Content:
I'm a pretty avid gamer, and I play Kerbal Space Program as my main game.

Back when I was 10, I used to play pokemon red a lot. And I didn't like the plot itself all that much but I loved glitches.

And ever since I've been obsessed with glitches.

So now I wanna know:
 

What are the drawbacks of Kraken Hunting?

I've encountered an undiscovered kraken before (the censored kraken) and documented it, and it corrupted my game (though i have confirmed its not caused by corruption) so I know that can happen, as well as saves becoming infested, but this seems really fun. Are there any other drawbacks?

Still not sure of the drawbacks, but I just discovered a new kraken. It's called the Pillow kraken. Basically, I named a kerbal a blank name and made his "trait" pillow instead of pilot (please don't ask why) and now every kerbal is him and whenever you try to get more kerbals only he appears, and he can duplicate when you try to remove him from a seat. After just 3 missions, he will replace every single real kerbal.

5 hours ago, krblman said:

What are the drawbacks of Kraken Hunting?

There’s a risk you might sound absolutely mental?! 

Seriously though, this game could use you on it’s testing team!

3 hours ago, FruitGoose said:

There’s a risk you might sound absolutely mental?! 

Seriously though, this game could use you on it’s testing team!

Woah cool! Anyway yeah, now  that I think about it, Kraken Hunting is basically just testing the game. So the two symptoms I mentioned are all that'll happen. Thanks!

 

To all moderators out there, can this thread be closed?
Well, sometimes you hunt the Kraken, and sometimes the Kraken hunts you...
